DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the feasibility, safety and efficacy of laparoscopic ovarian transposition in women less than 40 years of age with locally advanced cervical squamous cell carcinoma
DOC.brief_title: Laparoscopic Sentinel Lymph Node Localization in Operable Cervix Cancer
DOC.criteria: Stage IAI to IIA cervix cancer undergoing primary surgical management Previous pelvic dissection Previous paraaortic lymph node dissection Evidence of distant mets
